# Python packages required for water quality data analysis
# Install with: pip install -r requirements.txt
# DO NOT edit this file - just install as-is!

# Core packages (required for SQLite mode)
pandas>=1.3.0       # Data manipulation and analysis
matplotlib>=3.4.0   # Creating graphs and charts
seaborn>=0.11.0     # Statistical visualizations

# ============================================================
# ADVANCED USERS ONLY - PostgreSQL mode (database server required)
# ============================================================
# The lines below are commented out because they're NOT needed
# for the SQLite package you have.
#
# DO NOT uncomment unless you have a PostgreSQL server running
# and want to use analyze_water_quality_dual.py in --postgres mode
#
# psycopg2-binary>=2.9.0    # PostgreSQL database adapter
# sqlalchemy>=1.4.0         # Database toolkit

# Note: SQLite support is built into Python 3.x
# No additional database drivers needed for SQLite mode!
